mapper.insert: INSERT INTO player ( name, full_name, group_name ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{fullName}, #{groupName} )
mapper.update: UPDATE player SET name = #{name}, full_name = #{fullName}, group_name = #{groupName} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, full_name AS fullName, group_name AS groupName FROM player ORDER BY name
SELECT id, name, full_name AS fullName, group_name AS groupName FROM player WHERE id = #{playerId}

SELECT id, name, full_name AS fullName, group_name AS groupName FROM player WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{term},'%') OR full_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{term},'%') OR group_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{term},'%') ORDER BY name
